ai-kv15.7:1.1_0: who has attained the cessation of perception and feeling:
ai-kv15.7:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv15.7:2.2_0: “They are attaining the cessation of perception and feeling.”
ai-kv15.7:2.5_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv15.7:2.7_0: The discussion on perception is finished.
